# CommunicationHandle.Kind.custom

**Case**

A unique identifier that distinguishes one person from another.

## Declaration

```swift
case custom
```

## Discussion

An example of a handle can be a custom user ID.

## Identifying a handle type

- **CommunicationHandle.Kind.phoneNumber**: A person’s phone number.
- **CommunicationHandle.Kind.emailAddress**: A person’s email address.
title: CommunicationHandle.Kind.custom
